name: GoldenLand: Card game
description:
GoldenLand: Card Game is a card strategy in which the player has to use cards represented by various monsters. Each card has a unique behavior with which you can strengthen or attack other cards. To win, the player will have to win more rounds than the opponent.

Game Rules:
  • The game consists of several rounds. The player who wins more rounds wins the game.
  • Each player receives a deck of cards for each round.
  • After each turn, the player is given one card from his deck.
  • The round ends when the cards in the deck of players are out.
  • The round is won by the player who has more points. If the player wins 2 rounds in a row, the game ends.
  • To make a move, the player has a limited amount of time. If the player fails to make a move within the allotted time, the right move passes to the opponent.
  • The player has the option to skip a turn.
  • The player can only open one card per turn.
  • Every card has a game point.
  • With the help of cards you can strengthen your cards or attack enemy cards.
